<title level="1" right="Rules">[Evocation](/Rules.aspx?ID=266)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 298 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
[Evocations](/Traits.aspx?ID=65) capture magical energy and then shape it to harm your foes or protect your allies. Evocation spells often have a trait that comes from the type of damage they deal, such as [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), or [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Evocation
